description: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop a web-based internet banking system to view and make transactions, including Foreign Transactions, using a Multicurrency Account that is available in 13 currencies within one account.
accomplishments: Working closely with Product Owner to gather and define requirements.
Collaborate with Backend and Core Banking team to develop a seamless account inquiry and transaction flow, especially for SWIFT transactions, by using a Multicurrency Account.

description: Working closely with Product Owner, Stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to develop a reliable web and mobile application for a Partnership Management System.
accomplishments: Lead and direct 2 Backend Developers, 2 Web Developers, and 2 Mobile Developers to deliver clean and reliable code and features.
Increase development effectiveness by defining clear requirements before development starts in every sprint.
Successfully mentored 2 Backend Developers and 2 Mobile Developers to become full-stack developers by giving direction and opportunities to do end-to-end tasks.

description: Working closely with cross-functional teams and clients to develop specific requirement systems or tools to support corporate business needs.

accomplishments: Develop reporting and trading system for bond exchange called Centralized Trading Platform, built with Java and Adobe Flex.
Develop new features for trade cancellation and correction.
Develop several reporting services to generate cancelled and corrected trade data, calculate fees, and export them in Excel format.
Build and develop a web application for tracking pension fund collection.
Integrate with Core System to send pension fund data.
Maintain the production environment; fix bugs when found and implement performance improvements.
Build and develop a mobile application for insurance quotes and sales using React Native.
Integrate the mobile application with Prudential Core System to send insurance quotations and receive production data.
Maintain the production environment; fix bugs when found and implement performance improvements.
Help and guide agents when encountering problems while using the application.
